chat.delete_col_confirm_desc:
Some message types may not be displayed!
Update column filters to choose which message types it should display.
chat.fake_tag_tt: This is a fake message. Only you can see it.
chat.right_click_hint: PogChamp PogChamp PogChamp Hey! Try @:chat.right_click_hint_highlight on this message to discover lots of options!

form.trigger_cmd_disabled_tt: The trigger related to this command is disabled. Enable it back to use it.
form.spotify_down:
Spotify API is down.
Overlay and triggers won't work until they fix it :(
form.youtube_saving_token_aria:
YouTube chat disconnected to reduce API usage after a long period of inactivity.
Click to reconnect.
form.extra_chan_tt:
Channel to write to: {USER}
(right click for fast switch)
form.extra_chan_info:
Triggers, emergency mode, automod,
etc... will execute only for your own channel
form.youtube_not_connected: Not connected to any YouTube live
form.youtube_missing_scope: You haven't granted Twitchat permission to write on YouTube chat
form.twitch_missing_scope: You haven't granted Twitchat permission to write on Twitch chat
form.mode_private_details:
Send a message only {USER} will see.

Only works if they use Twitchat!
form.mode_question_details:
Send a message only {USER} will see.
The message will show them 2 buttons
"accept" and "refuse" to answer your
question with a simple click.

Only works if they use Twitchat!
form.mode_public_details:
Send a regular public message on
{USER}'s chat.
form.mode_private_mods: Privately send message to {USER} and mods
form.mode_private_mods_details:
Send a message only {USER} and mods will see.

Only works if they use Twitchat!
form.mode_private_mods_only: Privately send message to your mods
form.mode_private_mods_only_details:
Send a message only your mods will see.

Only works if they use Twitchat!

filters.title: Filters
filters.header: Choose which message types to display on this column
filters.no_selection: Please select at least one filter
filters.scope_missing: Needs missing authorization. Click to grant permission.
filters.tracked_tt: Messages sent by viewers you added to the tracked users
filters.short_tt: Messages shorter than 4 chars or containing mostly emotes

shoutout.received: {USER} gave you a shoutout to {VIEWERS} viewers
shoutout.given: {MODERATOR} gave a shoutout to {USER} on room {CHANNEL}

raffle.title: {USER} won the raffle
raffle.title_tip: {USER} won the raffle by donating {AMOUNT} on {PLATFORM}

message.occurrences: Number of times this message has been sent
message.blocked_user: This message has been sent by a blocked user. Click to reveal.
message.clip_permission_tt: Allow Twitchat to download the clip for better playback in the overlay
message.highlightBt_alert_tt:
Twitch made a breaking change forcing us to use their player for clips from other channels.
Playback might be laggy and a clip from an 18+ stream won't play automatically
message.stop_autospoil: Stop auto spoiling this user's messages

autoban_join.message: {USER} has been banned by automod after joining the chat as their nickname matches the following rule: {RULE}

chat.community_challenge: {USER} contributed {COUNT}pts to the challenge {TITLE}. They contributed {TOTAL}pts total.

subscription.sub_duration: Subscribed for {COUNT} month. | Subscribed for {COUNT} months.
subscription.sub_gift_total: They gifted {COUNT} sub on this channel. | They gifted {COUNT} subs on this channel.
subscription.sub_gift_upgrade: {USER} is continuing the Gift Sub they got from {GIFTER}
subscription.sub_gift_upgrade_anon: {USER} is continuing the Gift Sub they got from an anonymous user

chat.combo: {USER} sent {BITS} bit from Combos | {USER} sent {BITS} bits from Combos
chat.boosted: Your channel has been boosted to {COUNT} people
chat.train_cooldown: Hype train can be started again by your viewers!

raid.text: {USER} is raiding with a party of {COUNT}.

pin.unpinned: The following message has been automatically unpinned:

connect.off: You have been disconnected from the {PLATFORM} chat room {ROOM}

sponsor.title: üíù Support me üíù
sponsor.head:
Are you enjoying Twitchat?
Twitchat took more than 2 year of full-time work with no revenue to create.
It is free for you to use but, if you can afford it any tip would make my day brighter!
sponsor.head_reminder:
I hope your stream was awesome?
You requested to get a donation reminder at the end of your stream, here¬†it¬†is¬†üòÅ!
sponsor.remind_meBt: Remind me when i end my stream
sponsor.reminder_scheduled: You'll get a donation reminder after you raid a channel or end your stream üôÇ

discord.title: Join us on Discord
discord.content:
You have a feature suggestion or an issue to report?
Join us on discord!

adalert.title: IMPORTANT MESSAGE
contents: Twitchat is free for you to use but:
A message sharing a link to Twitchat will be sent every 2 hours on your chat with your account.
You can send this message with a bot account.
Donate any amount to disable it or become Premium to also unlock more Twitchat features.

updateReminder.content: View latest updates at any time using {CMD} command.

adBreakScope.content:
Want to get alerts when mid-roll ads are coming or playing?
Twitchat needs new permissions :)
adBreakScope.infos: {DASHBOARD_LINK} must be enabled on your channel.

donor.title: ‚ù§ Hey lovely donor ‚ù§
donor.info_1: Thank you again for supporting Twitchat with your donation.
donor.info_2: A list of all the donor is visible by everyone under {LINK}
donor.info_3: Donation are anonymous by default but you can chose to make yours public if you wish!
donor.thanks_change: You can change your mind anytime under {LINK}

close_confirm.info_1: Are you sure you read the message?

mod_tools.ban_confirm_desc: Are you sure you want to ban this user?
mod_tools.block_confirm_desc:
Are you sure you want to block this user?
They will be removed from your followers.

context_menu.tts_all_start: Read all their messages with TTS
context_menu.add_blocked_terms: Add this message to blocked terms

tooltip.restrictedUser: Message only visible by you and your mods
tooltip.returningChatter: This user chatted here twice in the last 30 days
tooltip.hypeChat: Hype chat. User paid for this message
tooltip.new_account: This account has been created {DURATION} ago

scope_request.title: This column filters require a missing permission: | This column filters require missing permissions:

watch_streak.label: {USER} watched {COUNT} consecutive streams and earned {POINTS} channel points.

added_to_playlist.title: {USER} added following track to the playlist {PLAYLIST}:
added_to_playlist.title_fail: {USER} failed adding a track to the playlist {PLAYLIST}.

added_to_queue.title: {USER} added following track to the queue:
added_to_queue.title_fail: {USER} failed adding a track to the queue.

Remove track.
Track will automatically
be skipped
added_to_queue.ban_user: Prevent this user from adding other tracks
added_to_queue.unban_user: Allow this user to add tracks again

kofi.subscription_tier: {USER} subscribed to tier {TIER} for {AMOUNT} on Ko-fi

unban_request.automod: Message contains terms that are flagged by automod

celebration.message: {USER} redeemed the Power Up "On-screen Celebration" for {PRICE}

hate_raid.title:
A hate raid has been detected.
Following terms have been blocked:

warn_chatter.title: {MODERATOR} sent a warning to {USER}
warn_chatter.default_reason: You received this warning because you had an inappropriate behavior. Please be respectful.

youtube_sub.new: {USER} subscribed for the first time at tier {TIER}

suspended_trigger_stack.title:
A sequence of triggers executions is making Twitchat unstable.
It has been stopped to prevent further issues.

tts.elevenlabs_credits_empty: You spent all your Elevenlabs credits.
tts.elevenlabs_credits_almost_empty: Your Elevenlabs credits are almost empty. You have {CREDITS} credits left.

custom_train_summary.title: "{NAME}" completed at level {LEVEL} at {PERCENT} for a total of {AMOUNT}.

many_replies.label: This message is getting attention with {COUNT} direct or indirect replies
